#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <algorithm>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>
 
#define get getchar_unlocked
 
using namespace std ;
 
inline int inp( )
{
    int n = 0 , s = 1 ;
    char p = get( ) ;
    if( p == '-' )
        s = -1 ;
    while( ( p < '0' || p > '9' ) && p != EOF && p != '-' )
        p = get( ) ;
    if( p == '-' )
        s = -1 , p = get( ) ;
    while( p >= '0' && p <= '9' )
    {
        n = ( n << 3 ) + ( n << 1 ) + ( p - '0' ) ;
        p = get( ) ;
    }
    return n * s ;
}
 
int main()
{
	long int n, i , a, b, ask;
	//int q;
	n = inp();
	long int sum[n];
	char str[100];
	
	for (i = 1;i <= n;i++) {
		sum[i] = 0;
	}
	
	int q;
	//scanf("%d", &q);
	q = inp();
	
	while (q--) {
		long int j;
		scanf("%s", str);
		
		if (str[0] == 'U') {
			a = inp();
			b = inp();
			j = 1;
			
			while (a * j <= n) {
				sum[a * j] += b;
				j++;
			}
		} else {
			ask = inp();
			printf("%ld\n", sum[ask]);
		}
	}
	
	return 0;
}
